info.name: PROJECT X.O
info.description:
## Introduction

Welcome to the Project API documentation. This API allows users to register, submit projects, and participate in both group and individual projects.

**Authentication**: JWT (JSON Web Token)

## Authentication

To access most endpoints in this API, you must authenticate using JWT (JSON Web Token). To authenticate, include the token in the `Authorization` header of your request:  
  
Authorization: Bearer

item.name: user API

request.description:
#### Create User (With Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `POST /api/users`
    
- **Description:** Creates a new user with the provided information.
    
- **Authentication:** Returns authentication token along with user details.
    
- **Request Body:** JSON object containing user details.

#### View User (Without Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `GET /api/users/viewusers/`
    
- **Description:** Retrieves list of all user form database.
    
- **Authentication:** No authentication required.

request.description:
#### Login User (With Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `POST /api/users`
    
- **Description:** Login registered user with the provided information.
    
- **Authentication:** Returns authentication token along with user details.
    
- **Request Body:** JSON object containing user details.

#### Update User (With Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `PUT /api/user/updateUser/:userId`
    
- **Description:** Updates user information for the specified user ID.
    
- **Authentication:** Requires authentication.
    
- **Request Body:** JSON object containing updated user details

#### Delete User (With Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `DELETE /api/user/updateUser/:userId`
    
- **Description:** Deletes the user associated with the provided user ID.
    
- **Authentication:** Requires authentication.

#### Get All Users where project is built using X Technical Stack (Without Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `GET /api/users/getUserbyTechStack/:techStack`
    
- **Description:** Retrieves a list of all users who have projects using a specific technical stack (e.g., JavaScript) in their portfolio.
    
- **Authentication:** No authentication required.

request.description:
#### View User (Without Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `GET /api/users/viewusers/:userId`
    
- **Description:** Retrieves user details based on the provided user ID.
    
- **Authentication:** No authentication required

item.name: Individual Project API

request.description:
#### View All Projects (Without Authentication)

- **Endpoint:**Â `GET /api/individual_Projects`
    
- **Description:**Â Retrieves a list of all projects in database.
    
- **Authentication:**Â No authentication required.

response.name: Get All individual projets

request.description:
StartFragment

### `GET /projects/:project_id`

Get details of a specific project by its ID.

EndFragment  

response : {  
"project_id": 1,  
"project_title": "Project Title",  
"description": "Project Description",  
"links": \["Link 1", "Link 2"\],  
"technical_stacks": \["Stack 1", "Stack 2"\],  
"user_id": 123  
}

StartFragment

## Errors

In case of errors, the API will return a JSON response with an error message and an appropriate status code.

- `400 Bad Request`: Invalid request data.
    
- `404 Not Found`: The requested project does not exist.
    
- `500 Internal Server Error`: An error occurred while processing the reques
    

EndFragment

body.raw:
{
  "project_title": "Sample Project solo 4",
  "description": "Description for Sample Project solo 4",
  "links": {"link1":"sampleproject3.com"},
  "technical_stacks": ["stack1", "stack2"],
  "user_id": 14
}

- **Endpoint:**Â `PUT /api/individual_Projects/updateProject/:projectId`
    
- **Description:**Â Updates project information for the specified project ID.

EndFragment

- **Endpoint:**Â `DELETE /api/individual_Projects/deleteProject/:projectId`
    
- **Description:**Â Deletes the project associated with the provided project ID.

item.description:
## Project Management API

This API allows you to manage individual projects.

item.name: Group Project API

body.raw:
{
    "project_title": "sampel Group project _001",
  "description": "Description for Group sampel project",
  "links": {"link1":"Groupsampleproject1.com"},
  "technical_stacks": ["stack1", "stack2"],
    "users": [21,22,24] // User IDs to add to the project
}

request.description:
#### Create Group Project (With Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `POST /api/group_projects`
- **Description:** Creates a new group project with the provided details.
- **Authentication:** Requires authentication.
- **Request Body:** JSON object containing project details.

- **Endpoint:** `GET /api/group_projects/viewprojectbyName`
    
- **Description:** view projects by matching project name (including single character matches).  
      
    
- **Authentication:** No authentication required.

#### Get all Projects using X Technical Stack (Without Authentication)

response.name: getProjectbyTeckStack

item.description:
StartFragment

### Group Project Operations

#### Create Group Project (With Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `POST /api/group_projects`
    
- **Description:** Creates a new group project with the provided details.
    
- **Authentication:** Requires authentication.
    
- **Request Body:** JSON object containing project details.
        

#### Update Project (With Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `PUT /api/group_projects/updateProject/:projectId`
    
- **Description:** Updates project information for the specified project ID.
    
- **Authentication:** Requires authentication.
    
- **Request Body:** JSON object containing updated project details.
    

#### Delete Project (With Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `DELETE /api/group_projects/deleteProject/:projectId`
    
- **Description:** Deletes the project associated with the provided project ID.
    
- **Authentication:** Requires authentication.
    

#### View All Projects (Without Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `GET /api/group_projects`
    
- **Description:** Retrieves a list of all projects.
    
- **Authentication:** No authentication required.
    

#### Get all Projects using X Technical Stack (Without Authentication)

- **Endpoint:** `GET /api/group_projects/viewProjectbytechstack/:techStack`
    
- **Description:** Retrieves a list of all projects that use a specific technical stack (e.g., JavaScript).
    
- **Authentication:** No authentication required.
 
    

EndFragment
